word_mean: 反向平行的：指平行排列而方向相反的分子，如脱氧核糖核酸链的5-3键就是反向行走的

sentence.Network_en: In silk, it would be better to describe the chains as being antiparallel.
sentence.Network_cn: 在蚕丝中, 更确切地讲,这些链是反向平行的.

sentence.Network_en: With a given collimator the integrated reflections in the parallel and antiparallel positions will be equal.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于一个给定的准直器,在平行和逆平行位置时积分反射是一样的.
